title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file the second time.
OB: The out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file in the same directory after exporting.
EB: The out of sync message should not be displayed when overwriting the exported jar file in the same directory after exporting.
SR:
1. Export a directory (project).
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
3. Try to overwrite the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Observe if the out of sync message is displayed.
